title: 08/11/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 08/11/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP checks in with the MMQB's Albert Breer about the NFL news Taunting Rules. Pro Football Focus' Steve Palazzolo discusses Tony Romo's Hall of Fame outlook. And Andrew Brandt the Deshaun Watson situation from a lawyer's point of view.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
